title: NeoBabel: A Multilingual Open Tower for Visual Generation
key_contributions: Novel multilingual image generation framework supporting six languages
Progressive training pipeline with large-scale multilingual pretraining
New metrics for cross-lingual consistency (CLC) and code switching (CSS)
Open toolkit with 124M multilingual text-image pairs
technical_innovations: Direct cross-lingual mappings without translation dependencies

evaluation_results.performance_vs_larger_models: Matches or exceeds performance while being 2-4× smaller

relevance_to_cohere: Demonstrates efficiency gains in multilingual generation
Provides open datasets and evaluation protocols
Advances cultural diversity in AI systems
